snippet: I wanted to find the frightened, closeted adolescent who tried to hide behind a scruffy beard and a haze of cigarette smoke.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Dan Shaw describes going to his college reunion in an attempt to come to terms with the four miserable years he spent in college, which were miserable largely because he could not openly admit to being gay.
lead_paragraph: I wanted to find the frightened, closeted adolescent who tried to hide behind a scruffy beard and a haze of cigarette smoke.

headline.seo: Reunion, and Returning as Your Real Self
headline.main: Reunion, and Returning as Your Real Self
headline.print_headline: Reunion, and Returning as Your Real Self
